name: BMW
description: The 2022 BMW 4 Series blends class and performance in a way that few other luxury small cars can. It has ample power, athletic handling, and an upscale interior filled with tech features.

name: Ferrari
description: It is powered by a 4.0-liter V-8 and a pair and three electric motors that produce a combined output of 986 horsepower. It can sprint to 62 mph in 2.5 seconds

name: Hondi Civic
description: The Honda Civic has 1 Diesel Engine and 1 Petrol Engine on offer. The Diesel engine is 1597 cc while the Petrol engine is 1799 cc . It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel type the Civic has a mileage of 16.5 to 26.8 kmpl
